media:group.media:title: Foaming waterfall
media:group.media:description:
Foam created by waterfall in soapy water. Simulation done with Aphros (https://github.com/cselab/aphros). Took 20 hours on 14000 cores of the Piz Daint supercomputer. Details and more applications in article (https://arxiv.org/abs/2103.01513)
Check out online demos:
- liquid drops and coalescence prevention https://cselab.github.io/aphros/wasm/hydro.html
- electrochemical reactor https://cselab.github.io/aphros/wasm/electrochem.html
